item.title: 俄罗斯煤炭行业陷入危机显示经济出现裂痕
item.description: 在高额借贷成本和制裁的重压下，俄罗斯的煤炭行业已陷入危机，中国需求放缓加上价格下跌，暴露出更深的经济裂缝。【原文：Russia’s coal industry has slipped into crisis under the weight of high borrowing costs and sanctions as slowing demand in China compounds with falling prices to expose deeper cracks in the economy.】

item.title: Prime Day 购物者在亚马逊和竞争对手中寻找最优惠价格
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，斯宾塞-索珀（Spencer Soper）将报道我们可以从亚马逊 Prime Day 促销活动的早期购买中解读出什么。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Spencer Soper reports on what we can interpret from the early purchases during Amazon’s Prime Day sales event.】

item.title: 美国似乎无法摆脱对中国工厂的依赖
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者 Katia Dmitrieva。今天我们关注中国对全球供应链的控制。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics correspondent in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at China’s hold over global supply chains. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 特朗普税法有望刺激美国工厂投资，但关税带来风险
item.description: 美国制造商在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的预算大法案中获得了他们所希望的商业税收条款，但总统反复无常的贸易政策有可能削弱资本投资的明显回升。【原文：US manufacturers secured the business tax provisions they’d hoped for in Donald Trump’s budget megabill, but the president’s erratic trade policy risks tempering any pronounced pickup in capital investment.】

item.title: 为兰特和雷亚尔下跌进行套期保值的成本因关税危险而飙升
item.description: 南非兰特和巴西雷亚尔的波动说明了交易商在评估美国关税潜在影响时所面临的复杂性。【原文：The gyrations of South Africa’s rand and Brazil’s real illustrate the complexities traders face in evaluating the potential impact of US tariffs.】

item.title: 非洲结束十年债务困扰，莫桑比克利差下降
item.description: 十年来首次没有一个非洲国家的主权风险溢价处于困境。【原文：For the first time in a decade, no African country has a sovereign risk premium in distress territory.】

item.title: 花旗银行曼特希认为明年全球股市涨势将放缓
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Gains in global equities will slow over the coming 12 months, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists, who said earnings expectations appear relatively optimistic given the “highly uncertain” outlook.】

item.title: 关税头条滚动，"守夜人 "不见踪影
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:19。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:19 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 比特币突破 118,000 美元，多头称反弹条件成熟
item.description: 面对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新一轮关税攻势，股票市场摇摆不定，而比特币多头则在为新一轮反弹做准备。【原文：As equities markets wobble in the face of a fresh tariff onslaught from US President Donald Trump, Bitcoin bulls are positioning for a fresh rally.】

item.title: 马来西亚机构将没收大亨约 7 亿美元资产
item.description: 马来西亚反贪局正寻求查封和没收与已故富豪、前财政部长戴姆-扎因丁（Daim Zainuddin）及其家人和同伙有关的价值超过 30 亿林吉特（约合 7.05 亿美元）的资产。【原文：Malaysia’s anti-graft agency is looking to seize and forfeit more than 3 billion ringgit ($705 million) worth of assets that are linked to the late tycoon and former finance minister Daim Zainuddin, his family and associates.】

item.title: 台湾通过国防开支及 340 美元现金发放法案
item.description: 台湾反对党议员强行通过了一项特别法案，为军方提供数十亿美元的新资金，以安抚特朗普政府。【原文：Taiwan’s opposition lawmakers forced through a special bill that provides billions of dollars of new funding for the military in a bid to placate the Trump administration which has urged Taipei to do more to defend itself from an increasingly assertive China.】

item.title: 据说申银万国已秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，申银万国集团有限公司已秘密申请在香港上市，这标志着这家快速时尚零售商向成为上市公司又迈进了一步。【原文：Shein Group Ltd. has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong listing, people familiar with the matter said, marking another step for the fast-fashion retailer to become a publicly traded company.】

item.title: 迅速卖出者取代稳定买入者，吉尔伯特债券面临更多动荡风险
item.description: 在政府最需要稳定的时候，英国债券市场的变化正在使金边债券成为政府脆弱的根源。【原文：The changing face of the UK bond market is making gilts a source of vulnerability for the government at a moment when it most needs stability.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空员工年薪创纪录后涨幅较小
item.description: 阿联酋航空集团今年给员工的加薪幅度较小，这表明这家全球最大的国际航空公司的所有者正在密切关注成本问题。【原文：Emirates Group is giving more modest pay increases to employees this year, suggesting the owner of the world’s largest international airline is keeping a closer eye on costs.】

item.title: 德国长期借贷成本创 14 年新高
item.description: 德国的长期借款成本将达到 2011 年以来的最高水平，因为投资者要求为政府的大规模支出承诺提供越来越高的溢价。【原文：Germany’s long-term borrowing costs are on course to close at their highest since 2011 as investors demand a growing premium to fund the government’s large-scale spending commitments.】

item.title: 第六街在欧洲功能失调的资本市场中获胜
item.description: 第六街合伙公司（Sixth Street Partners）正在伦敦扩大规模，打赌整个欧洲功能失调的债务和股权资本市场将创造更多的投资机会。【原文：Sixth Street Partners is scaling up in London, betting that dysfunctional debt and equity capital markets across Europe will create more investment opportunities.】

item.title: 索纳首席执行官称中国外交是缓解稀土危机的关键
item.description: 最大的汽车零部件制造商之一的一位高管说，与中国的外交突破是缓解稀土磁铁短缺的唯一短期解决办法，因为东亚国家的出口限制扼杀了电动汽车的生产。【原文：A diplomatic breakthrough with China is the only short-term fix for easing the shortage of rare-earth magnets, a top executive at one of the largest auto components maker said, as the exports curbs by the East Asian nation chokes the production of electric vehicles.】

item.title: 美国股市刷新纪录，卖家消失是不祥之兆
item.description: 美国股市的卖家越来越少，在股市飙升至新高之际，这可能是过度自信的一个不祥征兆。【原文：Sellers are growing scarce in the US stock market, a potentially ominous sign of overconfidence as equities roar to new highs.】

item.title: 美国国债波动率指标跌至逾三年低点
item.description: 一项衡量美国国债波动性的指标跌至近三年半以来的最低水平，进一步证明市场在经历数月动荡后正在趋于稳定。【原文：A gauge of volatility in US Treasuries fell to its lowest level in nearly three-and-a-half years, adding to evidence the market is stabilizing after months of turmoil.】

item.title: 西班牙、希腊天气警报持续，欧洲陷入炎热之中
item.description: 炎热、晴朗的天气正在欧洲大部分地区蔓延，下周西班牙部分地区将出现更极端的气温。【原文：Hot, sunny weather is spreading across most of Europe with more extreme temperatures due next week in parts of Spain.】

item.title: 英国经济增长令人担忧，英镑创 11 月以来最差表现
item.description: 英镑连续第六次下跌，创下今年以来的最差连跌记录，英国经济增长的下滑导致交易商押注英镑将进一步下跌。【原文：The pound headed for a sixth straight drop, its worst streak this year, with a downturn in the UK’s economic growth leading traders to bet on further losses.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称新加坡元有机会升至平价
item.description: 根据杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：There’s a chance the Singapore dollar will strengthen to parity against its US counterpart in the next five years, according to Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 报告称越南将贿赂案中的前省级官员投入监狱
item.description: 越南一家法院在一起价值 4500 万美元的腐败案中判处 41 人徒刑，其中包括多名前高级官员，该案与一家房地产公司在越南三个省的业务有关。【原文：A Vietnam court sentenced 41 people, including multiple former senior officials, in a $45 million corruption case tied to a property company’s operations in three Vietnamese provinces.】

item.title: 胡塞武装风险卷土重来，红海保险保费飙升
item.description: 在也门胡塞武装分子本周击沉两艘船只并杀害水手之后，驶过也门的商船的保险费用飙升，凸显了袭击如何使这一重要水道的风险重燃。【原文：The cost of insuring commercial ships that sail past Yemen’s Houthi militants surged after the rebels sank two ships and killed sailors this week, underscoring how the attacks have revived risk in the crucial waterway.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克与艾伯维的交易提振了印度生物技术股的乐观情绪
item.description: 格兰马克制药有限公司（Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd. ）与艾伯维公司（AbbVie Inc.【原文：Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd.’s licensing pact with AbbVie Inc. for its blood cancer drug is boosting optimism over Indian biotechnology stocks, with some brokerages calling it the largest such deal in the country.】

item.title: 债务负担下降，穆迪将阿曼评级提升至投资级
item.description: 在穆迪投资者服务公司（Moody's Investors Service）将阿曼的主权评级从垃圾级上调后，阿曼在不到一年的时间里第二次被提升为投资级。【原文：Oman has received its second upgrade to investment grade in less than a year, after Moody’s Investors Service raised its sovereign rating from junk.】

item.title: 高温刺激亚洲需求，液化天然气货运从欧盟转向新加坡
item.description: 一艘来自卡塔尔的液化天然气货轮已从欧洲转向亚洲，因为亚洲夏季的酷热正在推动需求激增。【原文：An LNG cargo tanker from Qatar has been redirected from Europe to Asia, where intense summer heat is driving a surge in demand.】

item.title: 帕内塔说，如果增长乏力拖累物价，欧洲央行必须加大减息力度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，如果经济扩张不及预期并过度拖累通胀，欧洲中央银行应进一步降低利率。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower interest rates further if economic expansion falls short of forecasts and drags down inflation excessively, according to Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 中国女继承人面临同父异母兄弟姐妹的 20 亿美元财富纠纷
item.description: 中国最大的饮料帝国之一的 20 亿美元财富争夺战正在香港的法庭上展开。【原文：A $2 billion wealth tussle at one of China’s largest beverage empires is unfolding in a Hong Kong courtroom.】

item.title: 美银美林称客户押注股市在回调前反弹至夏季
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的策略师表示，投资者指望美国股市在强劲的企业财报季后反弹，但年底前市场将失去动力。【原文：Investors are counting on US stocks to rally on the back of a robust corporate earnings season, before the market loses steam toward year-end, according to Bank of America Corp. strategists.】
